alert.note: Alert for Coconino; Navajo (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 10 at 4:23PM MST until September 10 at 7:30PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Coconino County in north central Arizona... Navajo County in north central Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST /830 PM MDT/. * At 422 PM MST /522 PM MDT/, National Weather Service Flagstaff Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain near Kaibito. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kaibito. This includes the following slot canyons... Starting Water Wash and Upper Kaibito Creek. This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Kaibito Creek, Navajo Creek, Square Butte Wash, Starting Water Wash, Sour Water Wash and Begashibito Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
